# mtclabpy

A comprehensive tool for molecular and enzyme calculations.

## Installation

```bash
pip install mtclabpy
```

## Features

- Enzyme Self Calculation
- Molecular Docking
- Molecular Pockets Analysis
- Mutations Analysis
- Solubility Prediction
- Affinity Calculation
- Kcat Prediction
